column2: "Hiya, partner! This area seems to be clear, so we can relax for a bit."
"I was thinking, when you're fighting you're always getting up-to-date information, right?"
"They tell us about the planet, other ARKS member locations, even enemy data. ARKS really does a good job of managing it all."
"When you think about the sheer scale of it, it's pretty amazing."
"I guess that just goes to show a fraction of what ARKS is capable of."
"But still, I wonder how they calculate enemy appearance chances?"
"Well, they've been doing it, so I guess there must be some method in place. Later, partner!"
